thread.title: DNA sequencing helping fight TB in Madagascar

title: DNA sequencing helping fight TB in Madagascar
text:
DNA sequencing helping fight TB in Madagascar 2:07pm BST - 01:34
An international team of scientists and doctors are using a hand held DNA sequencer in the fight against tuberculosis in remote parts of Madagascar. Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
An international team of scientists and doctors are using a hand held DNA sequencer in the fight against tuberculosis in remote parts of Madagascar. Stuart McDill reports.
